about_the_game:
As you explore the island, you'll encounter various challenges and dangers, such as hostile wildlife and treacherous terrain.
But survival isn't the only goal in Remote Island - you'll also have the opportunity to uncover the island's secrets, and even start romance with other survivors. The choices you make will determine your fate and the fate of those around you.

With beautiful graphics and immersive gameplay, Remote Island offers a unique and dynamic gaming experience that will keep you hooked for hours. So what are you waiting for ? Grab your pants and get ready to explore the mysteries of Remote Island !



This story puts you in the shoes of a soldier (Bryan) who crashes on a lost island during a helicopter flight. He is rescued from the crash by Carole, a mysterious woman who comes after him.
Once awake, he finds himself in a makeshift camp with 4 girls...

- Carole (0 Animation)
- Sarah (1 Animation)
- Sophie (3 Animations)
- Ava (1 Animation)

You'll have to get to know them, find out how they got there and understand the mysteries of this island.




This game contains 3 hours of gameplay at release (if dialogues are not skipped). Adult content will unlock as the story progresses.
Once you've reached the end, you'll be able to access a "Sandbox" mode that gives you access to all the animations available in the game.
Puzzles can be skipped if you can't solve them, but you won't get any Steam achievements.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual content such as animated sex scenes and nudity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 10th gen / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 11th gen / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Drive

short_description: Remote Island is a sandbox game where you play as a man who has just crashed on a mysterious island occupied by other survivors. Will you find a way to leave, or will you enjoy yourself and stay ?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Russian
*languages with full audio support
